song_name: The World Has Turned And Left Me Here
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, The World Has Turned And Left Me Here has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: The World Has Turned And Left Me Here has sections analyzed in the following keys: F♯ Major,  and D♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
